data.author: Tim Grant

changelog.release_notes: Added green and purple colour options, Added round layout (tested only in emulator)
Fixed day of week display in MM/DD format

Added Day of the week
Switched to openweather API Key

data.description:
Watchface displaying the time, date,current weather and forecasts for the next few hours.  By default the weather is provided by OpenWeatherMap, for increased accuracy Weather Underground can be used (after signing up for a free developer API key).  Additional configuration enables switching between Fahrenheit/Celsius, DD/MM format and toggling the optional battery indicator.  StraightForecast is heavily based on the "weather my way" watchface, with styling based heavily on the "straight" watchface.

Version 1.1 - Added a red colour option.
Version 1.2 - Added day of the week option, using openweather API
Version 1.3 - Fixed day of the week option in MM/DD format
Version 1.4 - Added green and purple colour options, Added round layout (tested only in emulator)

latest_release.release_notes: Added green and purple colour options, Added round layout (tested only in emulator)

data.title: StraightForecast
